about_the_game:
Sivi's Factory is a dark first-person horror game where you play as Felix, desperately searching for his brother in a massive scientific factory. From the very first steps, you're surrounded by a mysterious atmosphere, with dangers lurking around every corner.

The factory is a labyrinth of various workshops, hidden passages, and unknown rooms, where every new discovery brings new threats. You'll need to solve puzzles, explore dark rooms, and fight off a terrifying enemy that chases you throughout the factory.

One of the unique mechanics in the game is a watch with a cartridge that can be printed using a 3D printer to unlock various functions to progress through levels. Printers will also help create key items, such as access cards, which will open new locations and allow you to delve deeper into the depths of the factory.


You'll encounter four unique locations, each filled with its own secrets and traps. Dive deeper into the complex, solve engaging puzzles, and uncover the truth about what happened at the factory, where your brother is... and what secrets hide in the shadows.

Get ready for a tense atmosphere, challenging puzzles, and dangerous battles in Sivi's Factory.

Printers will also help create key items, such as access cards, which will open new locations and allow you to delve deeper into the depths of the factory.

name: Sivi's Factory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8300 4 core or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Sivi's Factory is a single player first-person horror game in which you play as Felix. You are looking for your brother on the scientific factory. Solve puzzles on the locations, explore new rooms, fight your enemy and go deeper into factory.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
